languages.text: "Вы — представитель династии фон Валанциус и друг Денза. Я вас поддержу, даже если вы решите назначить наследника своей волей. С {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумом{/g} могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

traits.locale_text: "Вы — представитель династии фон Валанциус и друг Денза. Я вас поддержу, даже если вы решите назначить наследника своей волей. С Администратумом могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

languages.text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."
languages.original_text: "Вы — представитель династии фон Валанциус и друг Денза. Я вас поддержу, даже если вы решите назначить наследника своей волей. С {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумом{/g} могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

traits.locale_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you decide to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the Administratum, but... I know who to throw a bone to solve them."

"You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you decide to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the Administratum, but... I know who to throw a bone to solve them."

"You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the Administratum, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

"You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the Administratum, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

"You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

languages.text: “你是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的特使，还是丹兹的朋友。就算你动用你的特权，指定你自己为丹兹的继承人，我也会支持你。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}那边可能会有些麻烦，不过……我知道该如何不动声色地解决这些麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: “你是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的特使，还是丹兹的朋友。就算你动用你的特权，指定你自己为丹兹的继承人，我也会支持你。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}那边可能会有些麻烦，不过……我知道该如何不动声色地解决这些麻烦。”

languages.text: «Es un{mf||a} enviad{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius y amig{mf|o|a} de Denz. Apoyaré su decisión aunque decida nombrar a un heredero personalmente. Puede que haya problemas con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, pero... sé qué regalos enviar para que olviden este asunto».
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: «Es un{mf||a} enviad{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius y amig{mf|o|a} de Denz. Apoyaré su decisión aunque decida nombrar a un heredero personalmente. Puede que haya problemas con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, pero... sé qué regalos enviar para que olviden este asunto».

languages.text: 「あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の使者であり、デンツの友人です。あなたの権限で相続人を指名したとしても、私は反対しません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}と揉める可能性はありますが…私の手にかかればいくらでも根回しできます」
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の使者であり、デンツの友人です。あなたの権限で相続人を指名したとしても、私は反対しません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}と揉める可能性はありますが…私の手にかかればいくらでも根回しできます」

languages.text: "Ihr seid {mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte} der Dynastie von Valancius und wart mit Denz befreundet. Ich werde Euch unterstützen, selbst wenn Ihr kraft Eurer Autorität den Erben selbst bestimmt. Es könnte Probleme mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} geben, aber ... ich weiß, wen ich schmieren muss, um sie zu lösen."
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid {mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte} der Dynastie von Valancius und wart mit Denz befreundet. Ich werde Euch unterstützen, selbst wenn Ihr kraft Eurer Autorität den Erben selbst bestimmt. Es könnte Probleme mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} geben, aber ... ich weiß, wen ich schmieren muss, um sie zu lösen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|un|une} émissaire de la dynastie von Valancius et comptiez parmi les amis de Denz. Je vous soutiendrai même si vous usez de votre autorité pour nommer vous-même l'héritier. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} risque de vouloir interférer, mais... je sais quelles pattes graisser pour qu'ils vous laissent en paix. »
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|un|une} émissaire de la dynastie von Valancius et comptiez parmi les amis de Denz. Je vous soutiendrai même si vous usez de votre autorité pour nommer vous-même l'héritier. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} risque de vouloir interférer, mais... je sais quelles pattes graisser pour qu'ils vous laissent en paix. »

languages.text: "Siz von Valancius hanedanlığının temsilcisi ve Denz'in dostusunuz. Otoritenizi vârisi bizzat belirlemek için kullansanız dahi arkanızda olurum. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} sorun çıkarabilir... Ama onları uzaklaştırmak için kimlere para yedirmeniz gerektiğini biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are an envoy of the von Valancius dynasty and Denz's friend. I will support you even if you use your authority to name the heir yourself. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: "Siz Von Valancius hanedanlığının temsilcisi ve Denz'in dostusunuz. Otoritenizi vârisi kendi kendinize belirlemek için kullanmak isteseniz bile arkanızda olacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} sorun çıkarabilir ama... Onları uzaklaştırmak için kimlerin sırtını sıvazlamak gerektiğini iyi bilirim."
